1.1.0.name: wordpress/google-adsense-dashboard
1.1.0.description:
Google Adsense Dashboard is a very simple Wordpress plugin to display your live Google Adsense earnings on your Wordpress Dashboard. Google Adsense Dashboard is designed to show Today's earnings only. Google Adsense Dashboard is compatible with Wordpress 3.0+ as of 10/07/2010.

*Google Adsense Dashboard is based off of agentc0re's plugin "Adsense Dashboard Summary" *Layout was improved, overlapping issues were fixed, and features I deemed unnecessary [to me] were stripped *Author URL: http://learnix.net/wordpress/
